feed.title: Bar Assistant Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Bar Assistant: v5.2.4
entry.content:
Fixes

  • Fixed wrong thumbnail URL getting synced into search engine

entry.title: New release for Bar Assistant: v5.2.5
entry.content:
Fixes

  • Fixed menu item having wrong thumb path

entry.title: New release for Bar Assistant: v5.3.0
entry.content:
New

  • Added PocketId as a SSO provider ```

Setup via:

POCKETID_BASE_URL= POCKETID_CLIENT_ID= POCKETID_CLIENT_SECRET= POCKETID_REDIRECT_URI= `` - Added import support forcocktailexplorer.co`

entry.title: New release for Bar Assistant: v5.4.0
entry.content:
New

  • Added Zitadel as SSO provider
  • ABV now gets recalculated when method dilution percentage changes

Fixes

  • Fix materialized path migration failing in certain cases

New Contributors

  • @fraser166 made their first contribution in https://github.com/karlomikus/bar-assistant/pull/485

entry.title: New release for Bar Assistant: v5.4.1
entry.content:
Fixes

  • Fixed recipe matching when complex ingredient includes multiple ingredient parts
